subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: The Rangers’ Derek Stepan tied the game, 3-3, at the nine-minute mark of the third period, but just 38 seconds later Phil Kessel put home his own rebound.
snippet: The Rangers’ Derek Stepan tied the game, 3-3, at the nine-minute mark of the third period, but just 38 seconds later Phil Kessel put home his own rebound.
